title: IHC Completes Acquisition of eFunder and Rebrands it as Zelo
description: IHC has completed the acquisition of eFunder, a UAE-based private financing platform for SMEs, and rebranded it as Zelo to enhance SME capital access in the region. Zelo operates as the UAE’s premier invoice financing platform addressing a USD 250 billion SME credit gap across MENA. Fully licensed by ADGM FSRA, Zelo offers fast, digital invoice financing converting approved invoices into working capital within 24-48 hours across industries such as construction, logistics, healthcare, industrial services, and oil & gas. The acquisition marks IHC's strategic expansion into fintech innovation to support SME growth and economic diversification.
source_name: IHC Completes Acquisition of eFunder and Rebrands the Platform as Zelo to Strengthen SME Capital Access in the UAE

opportunities.title: ERP Integration with Zelo's Invoice Financing Platform
opportunities.description: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software vendors can partner with Zelo to integrate seamless invoice financing modules into their platforms. By enabling SMEs to directly apply for invoice financing through their existing ERP systems, these vendors can add value to their software products and offer a unique selling proposition to SMEs in logistics, construction, healthcare, and other sectors. This is realistic as many SMEs use ERP software to issue and manage invoices, and direct integration can streamline their access to working capital.
roadmap_steps: Research Zelo's API and integration capabilities
Develop integration plan for ERP platform
Initiate partnership outreach to Zelo management
Co-develop technical integration and joint go-to-market strategy
Provide support and onboarding to SME users

opportunities.title: SME Onboarding Services for Zelo Platform Expansion
opportunities.description: Business consultancy firms with expertise in SME digital transformation can offer onboarding, training, and credit readiness assessment services for companies looking to utilize Zelo's invoice financing. Through workshops and digital toolkits, these consultants can help SMEs in construction, logistics, healthcare, and industrial services better understand digital financing options and prepare robust documentation for fast approval. There is demand from SMEs unfamiliar with fintech solutions, making this partnership viable.
roadmap_steps: Identify common SME barriers to digital financing
Build training modules tailored to Zelo's platform
Partner with Zelo to become an official onboarding provider
Market services to SME associations
Collect feedback and iterate training content

opportunities.title: Insurance Products for Financed Invoices
opportunities.description: Insurance companies can develop tailored products to insure invoices financed through Zelo’s platform. This partnership can provide both Zelo and SMEs with greater security against invoice defaults, making invoice financing more attractive by mitigating risk. The collaboration is realistic given the high volume and value of financed invoices and the existing need for credit insurance in SME ecosystems.
roadmap_steps: Engage with Zelo to access invoice risk profiles
Design insurance products that align with Zelo's clientele
Pilot insurance offering with select SMEs
Integrate insurance opt-in within Zelo's financing workflow
Monitor claims and adjust risk models as needed

opportunities.title: Data Analytics Collaboration for Industry Sector Insights
opportunities.description: Market research and data analytics firms can partner with Zelo to analyze aggregated SME financing data across industries. By producing regular industry insight reports, analytics firms can offer valuable benchmarking to construction, logistics, healthcare, and oil & gas sector associations, while Zelo strengthens its thought leadership. Realistically, Zelo’s data on working capital trends fills an industry knowledge gap and supports strategic business decisions.
roadmap_steps: Propose data-sharing agreement with Zelo (anonymized/aggregated)
Develop data analytics framework tailored to relevant sectors
Produce and publish initial industry insight reports
Market reports to trade associations and business councils
Gain feedback and expand data collaboration scope

opportunities.title: Invoice Verification Solutions for Enhanced Due Diligence
opportunities.description: Document management and compliance technology providers can work with Zelo to offer automated invoice verification, fraud detection, and authenticity solutions for submitted invoices. This partnership would help streamline Zelo’s due diligence, reduce risks, and speed up financing decisions. There is high practical value in fintech compliance and document verification using AI and blockchain.
roadmap_steps: Study Zelo's current invoice verification processes
Develop a compliance tech proposal specific to invoice financing
Request pilot with Zelo's risk/compliance team
Deploy verifications into Zelo's workflow
Monitor effectiveness and adjust algorithms
